    Overview: Hybrid OA data

Overview: Hybrid OA data

Source: vignettes/overview.Rmd
overview.Rmd
library(hoaddata)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

Datasets

This package provides the following data tables.

oam_hybrid_jns

Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor. Data were gathered from https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM and enriched with ISSN variants.

oam_hybrid_jns
#> # A tibble: 10,480 × 4
#>    agreement  lead          cr_journal_id issn     
#>    <chr>      <chr>                 <dbl> <chr>    
#>  1 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         70719 0306-0322
#>  2 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         70719 1865-8717
#>  3 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         76998 0003-5696
#>  4 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         76998 1613-0421
#>  5 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        304322 1438-2091
#>  6 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        304322 1868-9426
#>  7 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         75760 0232-8461
#>  8 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen         75760 2196-6761
#>  9 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        124445 0003-6390
#> 10 De Gruyter SUB Göttingen        124445 2156-7093
#> # … with 10,470 more rows

Number of investigated journals: 5576

By agreement

oam_hybrid_jns %>%
  group_by(agreement, lead) %>%
  summarise(journals = n_distinct(cr_journal_id)) %>%
  arrange(desc(journals))
#> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'agreement'. You can override using the
#> `.groups` argument.
#> # A tibble: 20 × 3
#> # Groups:   agreement [19]
#>    agreement       lead          journals
#>    <chr>           <chr>            <int>
#>  1 Springer Hybrid DEAL              2095
#>  2 Wiley Hybrid    DEAL              1404
#>  3 Sage            BSB                972
#>  4 CUP             BSB                332
#>  5 TaylorFrancis   ZBW                246
#>  6 De Gruyter      SUB Göttingen      104
#>  7 Karger          BSB                 71
#>  8 De Gruyter      ZBW                 63
#>  9 ACM             hebis               59
#> 10 IOP             TIB                 56
#> 11 RSC             TIB                 37
#> 12 Nature          MPDL                35
#> 13 BMJ             BSB                 28
#> 14 Hogrefe         SUB Göttingen       28
#> 15 AIP             TIB                 27
#> 16 SPIE            TIB                  9
#> 17 Portland Press  TIB                  5
#> 18 Thieme 2        ZB MED               4
#> 19 ECS             TIB                  2
#> 20 Thieme 1        ZB MED               1

cc_jn_ind

Aggregated data about the prevalence of Creative Commons license variants by year and hybrid journal as obtained from Crossref.

cc_jn_ind
#> # A tibble: 46,171 × 6
#>    cr_journal_id cr_year cc          cc_total jn_all    prop
#>            <int> <fct>   <fct>          <int>  <int>   <dbl>
#>  1        144347 2019    NA                 0    256 0      
#>  2         98185 2021    CC BY              1    256 0.00391
#>  3          3302 2022    CC BY              1    256 0.00391
#>  4        208685 2021    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  5          3428 2018    CC BY-SA           1    256 0.00391
#>  6         24919 2019    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  7           262 2022    CC BY-NC           1    256 0.00391
#>  8         98185 2021    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  9         55414 2018    CC BY-NC           3    256 0.0117 
#> 10          3428 2018    CC BY-NC-ND        3    256 0.0117 
#> # … with 46,161 more rows

Number of active journals: 5565

Number of open access articles with Creative Commons license: 409475

Creative Commons Breakdown:

cc_jn_ind %>%
  filter(!is.na(cc)) %>%
  group_by(cc) %>%
  summarise(articles = sum(cc_total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(articles))
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   cc          articles
#>   <fct>          <int>
#> 1 CC BY         298619
#> 2 CC BY-NC-ND    56013
#> 3 CC BY-NC       53255
#> 4 CC BY-NC-SA     1534
#> 5 CC BY-ND          44
#> 6 CC BY-SA          10

cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind

First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license

cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
#> # A tibble: 710,117 × 6
#>    cr_journal_id cr_year country_code cc          articles_under_cc_va…¹ artic…²
#>            <int>   <int> <chr>        <chr>                        <int>   <int>
#>  1         14473    2022 PT           NA                               3       3
#>  2         57812    2022 CZ           NA                               1       1
#>  3         42432    2022 BD           NA                               1       1
#>  4        317180    2022 BH           NA                               1       1
#>  5           223    2022 IE           CC BY-NC-ND                      5       9
#>  6          5214    2022 SG           NA                               1       1
#>  7          2520    2022 CL           NA                               2       2
#>  8           851    2022 SA           NA                               5       5
#>  9          3593    2022 FO           NA                               1       1
#> 10         66876    2022 RO           NA                              18      19
#> # … with 710,107 more rows, and abbreviated variable names
#> #   ¹​articles_under_cc_variant, ²​articles_total

cc_openalex_inst

Article-level affiliation data from first authors as obtained from OpenAlex.

cc_openalex_inst
#> # A tibble: 461,252 × 7
#>    doi                     cr_journal_id cr_year cc        count…¹ id    displ…²
#>    <chr>                           <int>   <int> <chr>     <chr>   <chr> <chr>  
#>  1 10.1002/1438-390x.1017            835    2019 CC BY     AT      http… Univer…
#>  2 10.1002/1438-390x.1019            835    2019 CC BY-NC… US      http… United…
#>  3 10.1002/1438-390x.12015           835    2019 CC BY-NC… ZA      http… Univer…
#>  4 10.1002/1438-390x.12016           835    2019 CC BY-NC  JP      http… Kwanse…
#>  5 10.1002/1438-390x.12018           835    2019 CC BY-NC… JP      http… Japan …
#>  6 10.1002/1438-390x.12018           835    2019 CC BY-NC… JP      http… Okinaw…
#>  7 10.1002/1438-390x.12019           835    2019 CC BY     JP      http… Nation…
#>  8 10.1002/1438-390x.12021           835    2019 CC BY     US      http… Duke U…
#>  9 10.1002/1438-390x.12022           835    2019 CC BY     JP      http… Univer…
#> 10 10.1002/1438-390x.12024           835    2019 CC BY     FI      http… Univer…
#> # … with 461,242 more rows, and abbreviated variable names ¹​country_code,
#> #   ²​display_name
cc_openalex_inst %>%
  group_by(cc) %>%
  summarise(articles = n_distinct(doi))
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   cc          articles
#>   <chr>          <int>
#> 1 CC BY         298619
#> 2 CC BY-NC       53255
#> 3 CC BY-NC-ND    56013
#> 4 CC BY-NC-SA     1534
#> 5 CC BY-ND          44
#> 6 CC BY-SA          10

cc_md_indicators

Crossref metadata coverage.

cc_md_indicators
#> # A tibble: 104 × 9
#>    cr_year agreement lead  article_total tdm_t…¹ orcid…² funde…³ abstr…⁴ ref_t…⁵
